fields.name: Info
fields.defaultValue:
This Form has been created to provide a standardized interface to hook up data workflows through the RSpace Python API, defined by the PyPI package inm-rspace.

In the Field "Input Data", insert a file from your Computer or R-Space Gallery, which serves as the input to a Python function. You can pass optional keyword arguments to the underlying Python function(s) via the field "Arguments (JSON)".

Finally, to define the Python function(s) to be performed on the input data, create an inm-rspace Workflow as shown in the examples.
